| 2015 Grant | 2016 Grant | 2017 Grant | 2018 Grant | 2019 Grant
--- | --- | --- | --- | --- | ---
Grant date | 1st October | 1st October | 1st October | 1st October | 1st October
Exercise price | 2,797.0p | 4,477.3p | 5,496.7p | 7,240.0p | 7,835.0p
Number of employees | 1,038 | 1,040 | 1,229 | 1,294 | 1,318
Shares under scheme | 34,449 | 22,173 | 22,411 | 16,687 | 16,820
Vesting period | 3 years | 3 years | 3 years | 3 years | 3 years
Expected volatility | 21% | 21% | 21% | 19% | 21%
Risk free interest rate | 0.4% | 0.1% | 0.4% | 0.8% | 0.5%
Expected dividend yield | 2.5% | 2.5% | 2.3% | 2.0% | 1.8%
Fair value | 2,931.3p | 4,696.7p | 5,799.0p | 7,623.7p | 8,305.1p

paragraph 1: Employee Share Ownership Plan
paragraph 2: UK employees are eligible to participate in the Employee Share Ownership Plan (ESOP). The aim of the ESOP is to encourage increased shareholding in the Company by all UK employees and so there are no performance conditions. Employees are invited to join the ESOP when an offer is made each year. Individuals save for 12 months during the accumulation period and subscribe for shares at the lower of the price at the beginning and the end of the accumulation period under HMRC rules. The Company provides a matching share for each share purchased by the individual.
paragraph 3: Shares issued under the ESOP have been measured using the Present Economic Value (PEV) valuation methodology. The relevant disclosures in respect of the Employee Share Ownership Plans are set out below.
paragraph 4: The accumulation period for the 2019 ESOP ends in September 2020, therefore some figures are projections.

qa.question: For which years of share issuance are the relevant disclosures in respect of the Employee Share Ownership Plans analysed?

tat_749_1.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: Yes, the document provides substantial information about the 2015 Plan, which is a part of the Employee Share Ownership Plans, and can help infer that the 2015 Plan is a significant aspect of the disclosures.
tat_749_1.Explanation: The document is partially relevant as it provides detailed information about the 2015 Plan, which is part of the Employee Share Ownership Plans. However, it does not explicitly mention the other years (2016-2019) relevant to the query. The document can help infer that the 2015 Plan is a key component of the disclosures but lacks the comprehensive year range needed to fully answer the query.
